item.name: Sri lankan Kiri Bath
item.description: Kiri bath, or milk rice, is a traditional Sri Lankan dish made with glutinous rice cooked in coconut milk. white rice simmered in creamy coconut milk until it's luxuriously soft and slightly sweet. It's a naturally delicious and comforting dish, perfect on its own or with a flavorful side.

item.name: Rice and Curry with Chicken
item.description: Sri Lankan rice and curry is a traditional dish that features a serving of rice accompanied by a variety of flavorful curries, including lentils, vegetables, and meat. The dish is known for its vibrant colors and aromatic spices, making it a beloved staple in Sri Lankan cuisine.

item.name: Rice and Curry with Fish

item.name: Rice and Curry
item.description: Sri Lankan rice and curry is a hearty local dish with steamed rice and a variety of spiced sides like dhal, veggies, and meat or fish, offering bold flavors in every bite.

item.name: Chicken Biriyani
item.description: Chicken biryani is a flavorful and aromatic rice dish made with marinated chicken, fragrant basmati rice, and a blend of spices. It's a popular dish in Indian cuisine, known for its rich flavors and vibrant colors.

item.name: Masala Dosai
item.description: Masala dosai is a South Indian dish made of fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with spiced mashed potatoes, and served with chutneys and sambar.

item.name: Paratha
item.description: Paratha is a flaky, layered Indian flatbread made from whole wheat flour, stuffed with vegetables and spices, and cooked on a griddle until golden brown.

item.name: Belimal
item.description: Belimal is a traditional Sri Lankan herbal drink made from the dried fruit of the Bael tree, known for its refreshing taste and health benefits.

item.name: Lime Juice
item.description: Lime juice is a refreshing beverage made from freshly squeezed limes, Sweetened and served chilled, perfect for quenching thirst on a hot day.

item.name: Milk Tea
item.description: Milk tea is a comforting beverage made by brewing black tea with milk and sugar, creating a creamy and aromatic drink.

item.name: Orange Juice
item.description: Orange juice is a refreshing drink made from freshly squeezed oranges, known for its vibrant color and sweet, tangy flavor.

item.name: Plain Tea
item.description: Plain tea is a simple and soothing beverage made by steeping tea leaves in hot water, offering a warm and comforting drink without any added flavors.

item.name: Biscuit Pudding
item.description: Biscuit pudding is a delightful dessert made with layers of crushed biscuits, creamy custard, and chocolate or fruit toppings, creating a rich and indulgent treat.

item.name: Caramel Pudding
item.description: Caramel pudding is a smooth and creamy dessert made with eggs, milk, and sugar, topped with a rich caramel sauce for a sweet finish.

item.name: Fruit Salad
item.description: Fruit salad is a refreshing mix of seasonal fruits, often drizzled with honey or lime juice, making it a healthy and colorful dessert option.

item.name: Ice Cream Sundae
item.description: Ice cream sundae is a classic dessert made with scoops of ice cream topped with syrup, nuts, whipped cream, and a cherry, creating a deliciously indulgent treat.

item.name: Chili Crisp Noodles
item.description: Chili crisp noodles are a spicy and flavorful dish made with stir-fried noodles tossed in a chili oil sauce, topped with crispy garlic and scallions for added crunch.

item.name: Dumplings
item.description: Dumplings are a popular Chinese dish made of thin dough filled with meat or vegetables, steamed or fried to perfection, often served with dipping sauce.

item.name: Supreme Soy Noodles
item.description: Supreme soy noodles are a savory dish made with stir-fried noodles tossed in a rich soy sauce, mixed with vegetables and protein for a satisfying meal.

item.name: Air Fryer Zucchini
item.description: Air fryer zucchini is a healthy and crispy appetizer made by air frying sliced zucchini, seasoned with spices, for a guilt-free snack.

item.name: Cheese Puffs
item.description: Cheese puffs are light and airy pastries filled with melted cheese, baked until golden brown, making them a delicious and cheesy snack.

item.name: Party Meatballs
item.description: Party meatballs are savory bite-sized meatballs made with ground meat, breadcrumbs, and spices, baked or fried and served with dipping sauce for a perfect appetizer.

item.name: Sausage Fried Rice
item.description: Sausage fried rice is a flavorful dish made with stir-fried rice, mixed with sliced sausages, vegetables, and soy sauce for a delicious meal.

item.name: Idli
item.description: Idli is a traditional South Indian steamed rice cake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, served with chutney and sambar for a wholesome breakfast or snack.
